Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan, you'll be centrally located in New York, steps from Circle in the Square Theater and minutes from Broadway. This 4-star hotel is close to Times Square and Rockefeller Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 795 air-conditioned rooms featuring MP3 docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Cable programming and video-game consoles are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and brunch, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and brunch, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The Majestic Theater - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Radio City Music Hall - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Ed Sullivan Theater - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi

International Center of Photography - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Madame Tussauds Wax Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Top of the Rock Observation Deck - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The nearest airports are:
New York, NY (JRB-Downtown Manhattan Heliport) - 6.8 km / 4.2 mi
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 9.6 km / 6 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 18 km / 11.2 mi

The preferred airport for Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan are:
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 9.6 km / 6 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 18 km / 11.2 mi
New York, NY (JFK-John F. Kennedy Intl.) - 21.4 km / 13.3 mi

The preferred airport for Crowne Plaza Times Square Manhattan is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

Message.Text:
***Important Information for Our Guests*** Minimum check-in age at this hotel is 21. In order to book your vacation the lead person on your reservation must be 21 years of age.

A minimum valet parking fee of $70 for Standard cars & $85 for SUV/Oversized per vehicle, per day. This does not include in/out privileges. Fee will be charged and collected by the hotel at check-in or check-out. The fee is subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees they may be responsible for but not a guarantee of the final amount due. Please note that this does not allow in and out privileges.

A minimum mandatory hotel-imposed fee of $35 (plus tax) per room, per day will be charged and collected by the hotel at check-in or check-out. The fee is subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees they may be responsible for but not a guarantee of the final amount due. For detailed description of what’s included in the mandatory fee please see hotel policies.

Room 1
From 2013-03-05 To 2030-12-31
Child policy
Persons under the age of twenty-one (21) are not permitted to stay.They have to stay with another person over the the age of twenty-one (21).

From 2016-09-14 To 2030-12-31
Stay Conditions
There is a restriction on stays longer than 28 day in New York City. Clients will not be able to make bookings for any longer than this.

From 2019-03-01 To 2030-12-31
Resort Fee
There is a resort fee of $35.00 plus tax per room per night, this is payable directly to the hotel by the pax. It includes 2 welcome drinks, local & International calls and use of the sports club on site.

RoomType.text: Double Standard Room with City View

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Where breakfast is included in booking, this is only for up to two adults in the room, extra charges would apply for additional guests. Please note, as of May 1st, the service fee is $30 per room per day (inclusive of tax) Rate is subject to change.
No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information:
Please note: Where breakfast is included in booking, this is only for up to two adults in the room, extra charges would apply for additional guests. Please note, as of April 1st, the service fee is $34.43 per room per day, rate is subject to change. Service Fee includes: 2 welcome drinks (beer or wine), Unlimited complimentary local & international calls as well as complimentary use of the New York Sports Club on-site Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Note: There is a Facility Fee payable directly at the hotel of $35/per room/per night + tax that includes two drink voucher (beer or wine) upon arrival, complimentary local & international calls as well as complimentary use of the New York Sports Club on-site **New York Sports Club pool will be closed for the remainder of the week effective immediately.** **the Broadway entrance of the hotel will be unavailable for guest use, while the retail façade is being constructed. We anticipate that the Broadway entrance will be closed though August 2019.
